summary: Uses the Ambient Animals list to spawn more leveled enemies.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#d5a6bd][b]After over 6,000 hours of play-time, I've memorized many of the spawn points used by the enemies wandering Skyrim. This led to boredom from never being surprised. Now, I think I have a simple solution.

[/b][/color][color=#00ff00]1. No scripts.[/color]
[color=#00ff00]2. No requirements other than Skyrim.esm.
3. Easy installation; just drop the file into the data folder that most other mods go into.
4. Original spawn-list is still intact, just more possibilities now.[/color]

[b][color=#ffff00]My first upload. [/color][color=#ffe599]I've used it myself with no issues for a full play-through, so should be fine.

[/color][/b][color=#ff7700][b]Thanks for looking, I hope you enjoy.[/b][/color]
author: ArmoredTroll
